alert.note: Alert for Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 19 at 3:33AM MST until December 19 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds gusting up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sweet Grass and Melville Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. The strongest winds will occur this morning with slowly weakening winds this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong crosswinds and blowing snow will make travel very difficult at times, including along Highway 191 from Big Timber to Harlowton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow could produce near whiteout conditions at times. Be prepared for fluctuations in visibility and slick roads. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... If you are driving a high profile vehicle with a light load, consider alternative routes or delaying travel in this area. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Keep a winter emergency kit in your vehicle. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
